description: This table stores modifiers associated with a charge entered at end exam (from the related multiple Charge Modifiers (I ORD 52408) item).

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record associated with this procedure order.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated charge in this charge modifier record. Together with ORDER_ID, this forms the foreign key to the ORD_PROC_CHG_EAPS table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple charge modifiers that are associated with the charge and the order id from the ORD_PROC_CHG_EAPS table.

columns.name: CHARGE_MODIFIERS_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for a modifier applied to a billing charge when ending an exam.

columns.name: CHARGE_MODIFIERS_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
